website_summaries.verdict: Since the RainBowl features a vibrant range of colors, convenient activation settings, and is easily secured to all toilets, it should be the go-to option for potty training parents.
pros: Adjustable arm fits all toilet bowls
cons: This toilet light requires 3 AAA batteries, but does not include them

customer_reviews.title: Close your bathroom door when no one's inside.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: It quit working after 16 months. Apparently the lightbulb died and it's non-replaceable. It does work, however, when the bathroom door is open and I just walk by on my way to another room, the light will come on and stay on for a cycle. I'm wondering how much faster the batteries will run down since I do pass by the bathroom often. I suppose I can just keep the bathroom door closed but know I won't remember to do that half the time. I'm still glad I got it but that will also depend on how often I'll need to change the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: MunchkinsMomsez

customer_reviews.title: This sucker is bright!
customer_reviews.text: So I always wanted one but was skeptical that it would actually work. This specific model is battery operated and energy saving due to its motion sensor setting. The lights appear really bright in the picture but at 3am, they are perfect! If you have boys, this is a MUST!!!! There is a stable light setting or a rotating color I call unicorn vomit. I am purchasing a second one for the other bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: GgAcE

customer_reviews.title: a fun little gadget
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gag gift for my husband, but it's pretty cool! The rainbow colors are beautiful and hubby loves it. No more turning on a light in the middle of the night. It requires batteries. We've had it for 3 weeks and it's working like a charm. The sensor is really sensitive. If you even walk by the bathroom it turns on. It's a pretty sight. I had no idea that it would seriously work. Not a bad little gadget.
customer_reviews.author: S. Blakely

customer_reviews.title: Supurb Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: My original RainBowl only lasted 3 weeks. The company sent us a new one and it has now lasted over a year. My husband sings its praises too!
customer_reviews.author: Rowena Riggs DeLuca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our super dark bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my husband for Father’s Day (but actually for me). We sleep in total darkness so we need to use our phones to light the way if we get up in the middle of the night. This is perfect. We actually like it better mounted on the small box on the back of the toilet. Since it is so flexible, we could make it fit just right. We have only had it a week so I can’t speak to longevity, but it certainly solved our problem for us!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Help?
customer_reviews.text: it works great. I have two of these. One died and after I put in new batteries, It only lights up in Blue, and not very bright. I love the product, but how do I get it to be bright so I can see when I walk into the bathroom? Normally when you get up in the middle of the night, no need to turn on lights to awaken your mate, it shows you just where to go and aim. But it died. How do I fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Krow

customer_reviews.title: Cool Gadget!
customer_reviews.text: I laughed when I got this for Christmas, but it's actually very cool. I will say this though, from sitting on the toilet seat it pushes on the flexible clip loosening it's grip and you'll have to tighten it a couple of times a week. Men with the seat up tend to get it dirty as well but it is attached to a toilet so that's a given. But at night when you walk in the bathroom and the bowl lights up automatically and starts changing colors you'll say "Oh, cool!" then it's worth those minor inconveniences.
customer_reviews.author: NJ Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Broken...both of them.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one, loved it! Bought a second one. They have both stopped working! One completely and the other is a lot dimmer than it used to be. I would not recommend this product. AND YES, I've changed out the batteries... Also, I can't find where to contact the company for any kind of customer support. Awesome...\s
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Fun but eats through batteries
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product at first and would have given it 5 stars right away. However, after continued use it seems like the motion sensor isn't the greatest so the light stays on longer than it should which wastes the batteries. It is nice to use. It lights up the toilet brightly at night so there are no more little boy messes on the floor in the morning. By pushing the button my child can chose one color or a rotation of colors. It is definitely a novelty. However, I'm tired of changing the batteries once a week. Writing reviews is a fun hobby for me. If you found this review helpful please click “helpful” below. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher King

customer_reviews.title: but I loved it. I no longer needed to turn on ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife got me this as a gag gift, but I loved it. I no longer needed to turn on the bathroom light in the middle of the night. Unfortunately it didn't last very long. After about a month the only light color that worked was the red, but that wasn't a big deal. Now none of the lights work and I have only had it a few months, and yes I changed the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got 2 neither worked!
customer_reviews.text: I think the idea is great and I still really would like one but neither one worked. The first one came and I was excited but it would not turn on. Checked batteries. Made sure I had them in correctly several times. It was completely dark. Did everything it said that it needed to operate. Still to no avail so I sent it back and got a new one. The 2nd one the exact same thing happened. I know I would love it but it didn't do for me what it promised so I have to one star them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for potty training
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in hopes of helping our night time potty training journey with our 3 year old. This was the PERFECT purchase!!! He loves getting to go potty into a glowing bowl. This also was a nightlight at times when we had to go into the bathroom at night since it sense motion. Anyone who is potty training must buy this! Its great :)
customer_reviews.author: Jaime and Chad

customer_reviews.title: I bought 3 of these and after a month, they all crapped out
customer_reviews.text: When I initially bought this item, I thought it was really cool. After a couple of weeks, it stopped changing color and then stopped working. I changed the batteries and it worked for a couple more days, then nothing. I bought another one, thinking that maybe the 1st one was messed up. Same thing as the 1st one. I then bought yet ANOTHER on, and once again, working, then not. Big waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Michaeldiaz

customer_reviews.title: Works for 90 days Only! waste of money!!
customer_reviews.text: After the original Batteries die, doesn't matter if you replace them for the best quality batteries in the market it will not work properly again! Bad product. NOT Recommended :(
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Carrandi

customer_reviews.title: A must have for bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This product works as it states. I really disliked turning on the bathroom light in the middle of the night. So with this, I don't have to turn on a bright light and I'm able to go back to sleep faster than before. Amount of light is perfect. The only con is that the way it's made could be tweaked so that when the toilet seat is lifted for cleaning, that it would stay on/attached. As it is, it falls to the floor, if you raise the seat which holds it in place. This could be easily remedied with a slight tweak to the design.
customer_reviews.author: Monica A

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Actually a pretty cool little device. No longer do I have to reach down in the dark to see if the toilet seat is down. As soon as you walk up, it senses you. I know some may view this as lazy but I don’t want to turn on the main light because of waking up my girl and because of how bright it is. I’m going to get some for my RV next. Update: Product only lasted a few months. Bought in December, installed in March and now it’s dead. It was great while it lasted but with a two month life span, it’s not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: This thing can make any toilet look fancy or like it’s a party in the bathroom. My hubby is legally blind and I got it as a gift for him for Valentine’s Day so it can light up when he goes to the restroom at night. The sensor on this thing is great it notices you from about 5 feet away and also turns off right when you turn the light on. The colors it changes are so pretty I never thought We would like it this much ! Also cool if you are potty training to make the toilet more interesting to children (my son is also a fan of it) Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift especially for the kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a super fun product. My husband likes it too which is a bonus. The colors gradually and gracefully change and when you find a color you like, you can set it to only be that one color. At night when your eyes are not adjusted yet, some of the colors are harsh. The white light on a white toilet, at night, is super bright and kinda hurts the eyes. I am also noticing that it is really sensitive and stays on a lot rather than sensing motion and turning on o ly when needed. Overall it is fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Literally a Hot Mess
customer_reviews.text: Loved the idea of this. The third AAA battery immediately overheated on first install and the whole thing smelled like burnt plastic and never worked.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Impressively bright and motion-sensitive
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my pregnant wife that has to go to the bathroom often during the night and she loves it! I’m shocked how sensitive the motion detector is in the dark! I was also impressed with how bright the bowl gets from the light. The only thing that I would change is having another button or two so the consumer has more options for the lights. There is only one button and, although I appreciated the simplicity at first, I would like more control of the color, timing, etc. of the lights. Overall I love this product and the company, along with their packaging. Very well done.
customer_reviews.author: Dallin

customer_reviews.title: cute and useful product
customer_reviews.text: Received this product as a gift and it not only is cute but it is also very useful. It detects your motion and comes on and stays on for a few minutes. Adds just enough light that you don't need to turn on a light . Love the array of colors but was kind of sad that the purple isn't at all as dark and pretty as the add showed. It was more of a dark pink. Overall seems to be a good product......have only had it a few weeks so not too sure on battery life or durability, but it did come with a Life time warranty . I would recommend this as a cute but useful gift.
customer_reviews.author: Del27

customer_reviews.title: Needs better attachment
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my husband in an attempt for him to keep the toilet cleaner when he pees in the middle of the night. Worked ok for awhile but is difficult to position securely. Fell off often and could be a little brighter. Have to clean it often
customer_reviews.author: Meena

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun....worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I'm not gonna lie, I gave this as a spoof type of gift to my husband and it's been one of the best gifts ever! No more super dark bathroom or super bright bathroom light in the middle of the night. Its bright enough to show you the way but dim enough to keep you from totally waking up (you know what I mean). The sensor works perfectly and both my husband and I love and appreciate it! I say go for it!
customer_reviews.author: MellieB

customer_reviews.title: This is COOL!
customer_reviews.text: I asked Amazon for advice on what to give somebody who has everything, and this was a suggestion. I bought it as a gag gift for my husband, but we all love it so much that we had to buy another one for our other toilet! It works great and everybody loves it! Highly recommend for anyone you have to buy for. Especially useful for gift exchanges at Christmas with a price limit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great gift! Usable!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun gadget. Hate the red color, half asleep and going to the bathroom with a red toilet can totally freak a person out, at least until you become used to it, which doesn't take long. It is easy to install, uses batteries, so be prepared there...it seems to really go through them. Other than that, I love that it nullifies my husband's reason to turn on the light in our bathroom at the wee hours of the morning.
customer_reviews.author: JKJergenson

customer_reviews.title: Sucks batteries like dementors suck souls!!
customer_reviews.text: In all seriousness - This thing uses SOOO many batteries so fast. we had it for a couple months and went through at least 3 rounds of batteries. For something you don't really want to touch all that often, it was an inconvenience and the benefits didn't outweigh the negatives. so we got rid of it. ---Follow me on Instagram for more amazon and product reviews @MeanderingMuggles ---
customer_reviews.author: Shadia Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Missing a part. Had to modify it.
customer_reviews.text: Overall this light is alright. I’m giving it two stars because it didn’t work at first. When I went to put the batteries in, I noticed one of the springs on the (-) side was missing. Therefore the battery cannot make contact. I found a spring that fit in and it worked. I’m disappointed it was missing a part, but happy I got it to work. The light is bright and made my young boys laugh.
customer_reviews.author: tshai

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully lights up your toilet bowl
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the toilet night light and my toddler loves it so much. It is called Rainbowl and I think it is such a cute and clever name. The light switches into eight different colors. The light is bright enough to light up a bathroom, but not as bright as a regular light, which is great for the middle of the night bathroom use. It is very easy to install and use. Just add 3 small A batteries and clip it to your toilet bowl. I am very satisfied and recommend this product for anyone looking for a bathroom night light.
customer_reviews.author: JohanaR

customer_reviews.title: Great stocking stuffer or very useful gag gift.
customer_reviews.text: I am only not giving this 5 stars as it does seem to have a slight issue with staying put over time. I have had it drop off the toilet and have the batteries fall pop out because it loses its shape and stops gripping. I’ve had it since Christmas and it’s happened twice (it’s now Jan 6). Still love it though! Kids think it’s super cool and fun. Great for helping boys night potty train.
customer_reviews.author: T.J.

customer_reviews.title: Decent gag Gift But, that's it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Xmass Yankee swap gag gift. Interestingly, I ended up with my own gift. So, I installed it in my own master math bowl. It work ok for a while.... colorful fun in the toilet bowl. After a while it started operating intermittently. More of an annoyance than fun. Plus it burns through 3 AAA batt's .... I ended up trashing it. Fun grab gift but that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: J B Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Works just as promised great value!
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to use. Put in 3 aaa batteries and place it on the edge of the bowl and your done. At night when you walk into the bathroom it lights up, and saves you having to turn on a light. Saves you the purchase price in electricity that your not using, so yes this is definitely something you should get, plus you have different colors depending on your taste. I plan on having one of these around for other areas that I need light in not just the bathroom, works anywhere you put it, not just the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Pederson

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome gift for my husband. He always turns on the light in the middle of the night and wakes me up 😑 it was easy to set up and am a huge fan of it. The only thing is that I wish once it was installed it would keep the width of the toilet- I have to readjust by the end of the day which isn’t a huge issue but might annoy people
customer_reviews.author: MrazLover

customer_reviews.title: Bladder relief without the blinding lights
customer_reviews.text: Cool little gadget for both kids and adults. I bought this for myself and my husband. We both hated having to turn on the lights in the restroom during those midnight bladder calls. Know how annoying it is already to get up to pee then you blind your eyes with the brightness from your restroom lights? Thank goodness for this little simple device. It's very easy to install and has made our late night bladder calls less annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs O

customer_reviews.title: I can see when I Pee.. 10/10, will pee again!
customer_reviews.text: On a more serious note, I was leary about this device.. I thought it wouldn't be bright, it wouldn't work as intended. When I got it, it was smaller than I thought (but how does one guess how large it would have been). I put the batteries in and got it working, held the button to get the color I wanted, placed it on the toilet, turned the lights off.. and was amazed at how bright it was.. and it was EVERYTHING I thought it might be. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for nigh time potty runs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my sister who has a cat sitter stay at her place when she travels. The cat sitter has bad "aim" so I got this as a sort of joke gift. She absolutely loves it when she has to get up in the night. It didn't help much with his aim and she still had some clean up to do but, it really works for when you need to make a night time potty run!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa J. Hertneky

customer_reviews.title: Bringing light to the darkest places
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most amazing and fun gifts I have ever received. Besides just the fun factor, it actually works surprisingly well, and I have gotten my use out of it since I do not have to worry about stumbling in the dark for the toilet. Only down side is that now there is no excuse for missing the mark when going during the night...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift - Not Too Sanitary
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gag gift for my dad's birthday - he loves it! He's always complaining about bumping into things when he gets up in the night to use the bathroom. He says the light is bright and very responsive to motion. I didn't realize when I bought it that the light goes INSIDE the toilet - yuck! I definitely don't want to be cleaning that! And neither does my dad. So instead he looped it around the toilet paper roll holder, so he gets the same benefit.
customer_reviews.author: M Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great night light
customer_reviews.text: Frequent night-time trips to the bathroom can be a nuisance to others if the ceiling light goes on and off. This little light in the toilet bowl does not bother anyone outside the bathroom (even with the door open), and it provides enough light for all of your toilet business. It's nice to have the motion detector, instead of fumbling around for the wall switch when I'm half asleep; there's enough background light at night to make it work - amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: TexasTen

customer_reviews.title: No more dark toilets
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be a nice gag gift but it turned out to be a very nice gift. Its really nice to have some light to see where you are going to sit or aim. I’m thinking I’ll buy some for birthday and Christmas presents. If you have thought about getting one for yourself, do it, you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Newt

customer_reviews.title: Great way to light up a bowl!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a move in gift for my daughter's new apartment. While she was not looking, I installed it. She was very surprised, and loves it. I must admit, it is pretty cool. I am 62 years old and considering one for myself. If you are pondering, pull the trigger, well worth the few dollars it cost.
customer_reviews.author: DSD

customer_reviews.title: Rainbow motion toilet sensor
customer_reviews.text: I love this toilet sensor ! You can get up during the night when it’s dark and not have to turn any lights on it usually comes on even before I get to the toilet! It’s a nice soft glow plus saves on electric bill! You can set it for different colors! I like the blue ! Wish I had bought this year’s ago 😊 Try it out you’ll be glad you did! Also has a great warranty and very simple to install or remove from toilet bowl for cleaning ! Very happy and satisfied customer you can’t go wrong on this one !!!😁
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for younger boys!
customer_reviews.text: I was always skeptical about night-lights in the bathrooms to help those inevitable midnight trips. I ended up purchasing this for my kid's bathroom and he LOVES it. I found the light to be way too bright and would not use it in my bathroom. It makes an easier target for the little ones and I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dove Family

customer_reviews.title: Great for potty training parents
customer_reviews.text: I love this light more than I thought I would. It is the perfect shade of colors. Not to bright but not to dem. I'm also in middle of potty training and this has help at night a lot. My son dont complain about getting up and using the restroom because if the light hurting his eyes. The colors are pretty color to look at as they change colors. The only thing I wish was different if it was rechargeable.
customer_reviews.author: ashley spears

customer_reviews.title: Helps with the late night peeing.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have had this when I was pregnant, I wouldn't have had trouble finding the toilet. My husband doesn't like the bendy part, it doesn't clamp to the toilet well enough. Personally, I love it. It works even when the lid is down, which we do because of our dogs. The area by our toilet isn't well lit, so it really helps out.
customer_reviews.author: Angie W

customer_reviews.title: It was so nice not having to turn on any lights and not ...
customer_reviews.text: I know this is listed as a gag gift item but I’m here to say that this toilet bowl light is the real deal. If you are pregnant or just have a small bladder and have to get up several times in the night to use the bathroom you NEED this light! It was so nice not having to turn on any lights and not having to worry about tripping over anything. The lights were bright enough to find my way to the toilet and they are just plain fun. Perfect gift for anyone who is up a lot at night!
customer_reviews.author: javman

customer_reviews.title: will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I love this light. Our bathroom light stopped working for some reason and also who likes being blinded in the middle of the night? My hubby loves it and so do guests. We definitely plan on getting another for our guest bathroom. It works great and i love that we can change the light color
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: It was good but not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: The motion detection is alright, but I was really looking for something that turned on when the toilet lid was lifted, which this did not do. If I wanted it to turn on in the middle of the night, I’d have to wave my hand over the sensor. It had great lighting though!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Fun Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the toilet light for a friend who loves led lights in her apartment. I thought it would be a fun way to add color in her bathroom without spending too much money. The product itself, was cheap for the quality and easy to attach on the toilet. I also enjoyed that it is motion sensored so the light will last a lot longer. Overall, the light was a hit with my friend and I am tempted to buy one for my own home to add some fun into my own bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Got it as a gag gift but found it really helpful
customer_reviews.text: This provides just the right amount of light when we use the toilet in the middle of the night. It is not too bright, but just bright enough. We are really pleased with it. We recently replaced the battery when the first battery wore out. The multiple colors are a plus, and we like it that the colors change automatically. This was one of those gag gifts that turned out to be very useful and really great.
customer_reviews.author: 40 year pioneer

customer_reviews.title: Seriously it's a great laugh, gag gift or funny for the grandkids
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how I should write this review ... laughing or functional! Seriously it's a great laugh, gag gift or funny for the grandkids...but every single person who "had the experience" wants one because they make sense ! I have a critically ill husband who is a fall risk and this really does make midnight trips to the potty a bit safer!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Simple joy - BIG hit!
customer_reviews.text: This nightlight is easy to use. Just put in batteries and bend it to the toilet rim to your liking and enjoy a fun colorful light show. The motion sensor works really well, automatically turns off when you switch your bathroom light on and this is a small addition to your bathroom but such a BIG hit! I bought two one for my family and another as a gift and I know they will have fun with it as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lights up your night!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for his birthday and he LOVES it, and I do too. It is so fun to go into the bathroom in the middle of the night and not have to turn on a light. It makes getting back to sleep much easier. And the bright colors are great. We have it on rainbow display, but you can also just pick a your favorite color. One caution... pay attention to the instruction that says to put good, new batteries in it. I had one old one and it went out after one day. When I replaced the old batter, it worked (and still works) fine.
customer_reviews.author: carol k.

customer_reviews.title: We Were Bowled Over
customer_reviews.text: My son and daughter-in-law sent me a RainBowl for my birthday. I LOVE it! A sensor operated night light in your very own toilet! I pot-ty-cularly enjoy the changing of the lights. I told my husband that now I need a fancy new commode with a floating lid to accent my RainBowl! We have already purchased 2 more for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Pons

customer_reviews.title: Great for first, second or last time college students!
customer_reviews.text: We saw one in Napa earlier this year, found it equally as functional as a sort of safety device, as it is quirky and fun. Everyone knows how dangerous navigating a dark, unfamiliar room, during a personal emergency, whilst emotionally compromised can be in Napa. It’s like a little rainbow lighthouse in a dark, cold harbor during the perfect storm at 3:25am guiding you safely away from the hazardous reefs and rocks to finally, gently dock, tie off and unload the worries of the day.
customer_reviews.author: The Jayman

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty terrific. I will be ordering one for everyone ...
customer_reviews.text: My Husband was not thrilled when I ordered this, yet now, he loves it and so do I. I showed it to my friends and they both want to order one. I showed the video I took of how it changes colors to the teachers I work with, they thought it was hilarious that I was so excited about a Rainbowl,until they saw my video. Now they want to order one as well. It is all it says it is. It lights with motion. It changes colors. It's pretty terrific. I will be ordering one for everyone in my family. I feel badly for you if you are not in my family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Colors & Great Lighting in the bowl
customer_reviews.text: What a fun product! It lights the toilet bowl with vibrant colors enough to see for when you have to visit the toilet in the night. I like that I don’t have to put my bathroom light on and blind my eyes. It works great for what I needed. I would definitely recommend this product as a fun gift for someone you know, well :)
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Device
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific item. I have trouble sleeping and cannot tolerate any ambient light at night. With this "potty light" I can get up and go to the bathroom without turning a bright overhead light on. It has worked well, so far. I have actually ordered another one for my guest bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Donna OBie

customer_reviews.title: Houseful of Guys! Ready, Aim, FIRE!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! I have a dark bathroom, even in the daytime. This nitelight is fantastic - it only comes on when you enter the room - the toilet lights up - no need to turn on the lights - and it's Ready, Aim, FIRE! I bought an extra for the kids bathroom, too. Three sons! My tween and teener sons love it!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love mine and it quite working so i contacted the seller and he replied within the hour sending me a new one. Great product I used my for a year before it gave out. My Kitty loves them to he loves to watch the toilet flush. He has one in his bathroom also. It really helps me to the bathroom at night.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth 2 bucks
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these lights and neither one works. The batteries were installed correctly and were from a brand new package. One light came in a box that was torn and the device wasn't in a bubble wrap pouch like the second one was, so I'm assuming that the damaged box was already a return for not working. I want a refund. Not going to bother with replacements.
customer_reviews.author: S. Zeier

customer_reviews.title: Piece of JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Would rate 0 but not an option. 1st one sent did not work when the battery storage cover is shut. 2nd one they sent just did not work at all. JUNK. Dont buy.
customer_reviews.author: Von Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Easy use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and use. We like that there is a light in the toilet now for middle of the night bathroom runs. We don’t have to put on the whole bathroom light and squint to see. Good idea and invention. Wish I thought of it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shalimar  Sonnier

customer_reviews.title: Great gift! Bright! Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas! He loves it!! When you got to go to the bathroom during the night, no need to turn on any lights. The motion detector works well and the light is bright enough to see going to & from the bathroom. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amy & Tony Gaines

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't sense anything
customer_reviews.text: I tried to get this thing to work, but it wouldn't sense anything. I even waived my hand near the toilet to try it. It was terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: A little bright, but better than hurting your shin
customer_reviews.text: It is a fun and useful thing to have. You don’t have to turn on bright lites to go into the bathroom. It is a little extra sensitive to movement, but I would rather have that than crack my shin. The only downside is my obsession with cleaning it. I keep a pair of rubber gloves next to my cleaning supplies, but I am afraid I may break it because the holder is not very thick.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Hannigan

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Definitely glad I purchased this. I have one motion Sensor in one of my bathrooms and decided to purchase this one for another bathroom. It turns on everytime I walk into the bathroom at night. Its bright enough to where I can see where I am but not too bright to wake me up. The color options are great and easy to change the colors.
customer_reviews.author: E Berke

customer_reviews.title: Everything
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome, I had bought one for my house and when my grandson saw it on a sleep over he took it home with him when he left and then I bought one for the other grandchild lol, so in all I have bought 3 now 😊
customer_reviews.author: Dina Helm

customer_reviews.title: Cute, funny idea. But also helpful!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my Valentine for those nighttime bathroom trips. He laughed really hard when he opened it, which was the response I was going for. However, it’s also very practical and works great! Very happy with the purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Reader girl

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It does what it's supposed to and we are enjoying it. Nice and fun gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget works great!! I love the rainbow of colors and the option to choose a particular color or let it change the color on its own. It is very easy to install. My husband really loves it and our kids use our bathroom every chance they get. It is fun to look at and relaxing at the same time. I will definitely gift these to people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: super cool father's day gift
customer_reviews.text: super cool father's day gift. we opted for a gag gift this year. it was funny and well received for a dad that gets up often at night. he thought it was really cool and loves the purple light setting as it is the least bright and still give visibility in the middle of the night and can still see. thinking of getting
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RainBowl Motion light is just right!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this Rainbowl light for our master bathroom bowl, II have to tell you it is perfect and met our goal. We like the colors and it is not to bright, when we walk into the bathroom the motion turns on the light. It helps us in the middle of the night to see, now I hit the bowl every-time I pee.
customer_reviews.author: Brosss

customer_reviews.title: Great way to lite the night
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife who was getting up during the night. She did not want to turn on lights to disturb me. This is a small unobtrusive lite that provides adequate light to do what you need to do. We did not place on the toilet as suggested, we placed it on the back of our bathroom counter. As you enter the room it turns on automatically and goes through an assortment of colors before turning off. This is the perfect light for all of your night time needs.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L.

customer_reviews.title: Soft light nightlight.
customer_reviews.text: Love the nightlight...when you need to go in the middle of the night and you get blinded turning on the lights...as soon as you approach the bathroom the toilet bowl light's sensor comes on...it's great, no need to turn on a bright blaring light again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great!!!! No issues at all. Colors are great and vibrant, motion sensor works perfect and shuts off in one minute. No more need for a night light in the bathroom and no more bumping into things on those middle of the night bathroom visits. Just bought another as a gift for my parents. If you buy one you will not be disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: ButterBean

customer_reviews.title: This thing was surprisingly awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Ok I bought this on a whim for my fiance and a funny stocking stuffer and... We both love it. I'm getting them for the rest of the toilets in the house! It's super handy at night when you're half awake, no more turning on lights to wake your partner, and it's super easy to load the batteries and clip to any loo. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Maxam

customer_reviews.title: Don't cross the streams!
customer_reviews.text: Got this a gag for my old man; this dude has had a flashlight in his pocket my entire life, thought for sure this would be a hit. He never even installed it. To me it's halarious and practical.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Robert Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Light up the toilet
customer_reviews.text: Even with the moldable arm anytime you lift the seat, 8 out of 10 times it’ll fall to the floor and spill the batteries - not sure how they can improve it but I’ll try some double stick tape as a cure
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S. McKeen

customer_reviews.title: That the signal has good range. It lights up at the doorway.
customer_reviews.text: First of all I bought the first for my husband as he needs a little help with light at nite. It was just the perfect thing. Then my little 4 yr adopted granddaughter next door saw it. She just loved it. I order her one right away and had for her in 2 days. She was afraid to go to the bathroom at night because the nite light wasn’t enough lite for her now her mom says she’s not afraid anymore. So you should get two big treats for this
customer_reviews.author: Anne Sue Cheney

customer_reviews.title: Good little toy for the house
customer_reviews.text: You will need to get 3 triple A batteries before using, also the red color is light but at night it might look brighter. Every other color looks bright and good, the motion detection works great and so does the sensor for light 💡
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Originally I bought it as a gag gift for my fiancé but it works extremely well. The motion sensor sensors you outside of the door and will turn on so you do not have to use any lights. It goes through about a two minute timing and then turns off unless there is more motion. It’s actually very bright and works extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: Kyana Siepe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing idea, so convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this item! No need to turn on a light in the night to use the toilet. My 3 year old grandson liked it so much he only wanted to use our bathroom. So I bought one for him!!
customer_reviews.author: Lilacs4me

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect product to light up the bathroom when it’s dark outside/in the house. It is bright enough to see by but not so bright that you can’t go right back to sleep. We hook it around the cabinet door handle next to the toilet. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ggmk

customer_reviews.title: A bit unnerving to see a pinky-peach bowl before/during/after you use the toilet...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is weird. Not sure it'll stick around after the novelty wears off or after I have to clean the thing because you know it'll get gross and I sure don't need one more surface to clean in a bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: vonNiles

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work. Light sensor doesn’t respond to darkness unless I physically cover the sensor. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Fast shipping. The boys picked this gift for their dads birthday. They are thrilled.. everything they wanted. They said probably only rich people would have this. Now they do too !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A funny gift that we actually love!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would at least be a funny gift but we actually both like it! The light switch controls the power to the outlets in this old farmhouse bathroom so nightlights weren't an option. This is the perfect solution for us for midnight bathroom trips. The light is bright enough to illuminate the bathroom but dim enough that you aren't "woken up". Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alaura

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how great this works. The motion detector is wonderful. Our toilet is in it own room with a door. It comes on as soon as that door opens. The brightness is great we don't have to turn the light on. My girls want me to order more for their bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie0511

customer_reviews.title: They truly honor the lifetime warranty
customer_reviews.text: My unit stopped working (possibly due to some water getting in), and I contacted them about it. Within 24 hours they said they would honor the lifetime warranty and send me their new upgraded unit. Thank you MindGlowing!
customer_reviews.author: psynapz

customer_reviews.title: Light bowl
customer_reviews.text: This is the best gift ever! I hate turning on the restroom light at 1am-4am because I lose my tiredness. This toilet bowl motion detector is amazing. I no longer dread getting up in the middle of the night to use the restroom. This is a perfect gift for child to adult. I even bought one for my mom!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I have liked this product so far. I like that it has multiple colors and provides light for my son when he needs to get up in the middle of the night. He is 5 and thinks it is amazing to change the toilet bowl color!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the RainBowl! So handy for nighttime bathroom visits. No need to turn on the light in the middle of the night and blind yourself or disturb your sleep. The colors are vibrant, sensor works perfectly! Lights up the whole room! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Christina brinton

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Wouldnt work right out of the box. Motion detection didn’t work. Lights wouldn’t change color. The clear plastic part over the sensor fell off just by touching it.
customer_reviews.author: AStoan

customer_reviews.title: No more stumbling in the dark
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these now! At first had a hard time with it falling off when the seat was opened, but put a command strip on it and it’s great. Put one in our guest bath and it might have been the highlight of the trip for the kids staying with us. It so great for middle of the night bathroom trips, no more stumbling in the dark - wish I had it with my pregnancies (it’s my new fav gift to give expecting friends)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Wright

customer_reviews.title: It might surprise you hire useful this is!
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical of the usefulness of this product.. bought as more of a gag gift.. but it really surprised me how much we enjoy it! I hated turning the light on when using the restroom late at night and it's also useful for adding just enough light for just grabbing a tissue or washing hand etc.. already gifted two to friends. Only negative is that it came with a free product, after a quick online verification, and mine never arrived, which isn't a big deal because it was free.. but still...I still give the product a Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: No need to turn on bathroom light!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gag gift but as it turns out it’s a great item! Very practical. Eliminates having to turn on the bathroom light for those nighttime visits. It cycles through a number of colors or you can set it to one color. It turns on when it senses motion in the dark and shuts off after you walk away. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Rosane

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Works Perfect! Kids love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We have a small pocket bathroom and I wanted a night light, but no outlet. I hung the light from a hook and it's Perfect!! I didn't need it in the potty.. just wanted something that had a sensor. Now when the Grandkids come.. it's will be much easier! Thanks! Great Product!! Works perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Carllin Tormohlen

customer_reviews.title: for the reasons that 1)We love the night light & 2) they had fantastic customer ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these for our home about 5 weeks ago. One is still working perfectly, but the other stopped working. I contacted the seller and they responded within minutes to offer to send me a replacement. So, for the reasons that 1)We love the night light & 2) they had fantastic customer service, I give it a 5 star ;-)
customer_reviews.author: JennRU

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: I have this brand and another brand. This brand works perfectly well and is a wonderful addition to my children's bathroom. Just the other night my son was about to turn on a bright bathroom light and risk waking our baby, and I said don't worry about it, the toilet lights up!
customer_reviews.author: TheJohnston7

customer_reviews.title: Happy that surprise gift was well received
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my daughter and her husband. My daughter found it creative and useful. So far as I know, it all worked just fine, or she'd return it (she's rather particular). I am happy that she is happy!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Warren

customer_reviews.title: Funny thing is it works great and he loved it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gag gift for my husbands birthday. he gets up several times a night to go to the bath room and I thought it would be Helpful/funny to have this glowing when he goes half asleep! Funny thing is it works great and he loved it! I might even get another one for the guest bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

product_meta.title: Toilet Bowl Night Light with Motion Sensor LED by RainBowl - Funny & Unique Birthday Gift Idea for Men, Him, Dad, Boyfriend, Husband, Women, Her, Mom - Cool Fun Gadget, Best Gag Housewarming Present…
feature_bullets: 👌🏽 WE PUT THE FUN IN FUNCTIONAL. You must know that feeling when, woken up by nature's call you're lying in bed, planning your bathroom trip. Whether you're stressed about turning on the blinding lights, bumping into stuff (FYI, there are yearly over 30.000 toilet related injuries in the US alone) or worried about waking up your better half, RainBowl is the BEST SOLUTION.

🚽 FLAWLESS SENSORS set off the motion activated nightlight only at nighttime, when you need it most and in order to SAVE ENERGY RainBowl will stay on for just 2 minutes after last detected movement. THE STURDY ADJUSTABLE ARM allows an EASY INSTALLATION on ANY TOILET BOWL. Forming a firm grip around the toilet rim, it makes sure the lighting accessory STAYS SNUG, without dropping whenever you raise or lower the seat. So simple.

🌈 THE MULTI COLOR CAROUSEL will entertain your child while POTTY TRAINING. Simply by pressing a single button your toddler can choose to freeze his / her favorite rainbow shade and, if he / she gets bored, press again to switch back to the SMOOTH COLOR TRANSITIONING mode. The LED lamp at the end of the rod is encased in FULL ABS PLASTIC preventing water damage from casual splashes. However, please be gentle.

🎁 DON'T KEEP ALL THE AWESOMENESS TO YOURSELF! Hands down, have you ever seen a more practical and unusual GIFT IDEA? Mugs and other boring presents are ancient history! Whether it’s your mother & father 's anniversary, a co-worker’s retirement or you're attending a present exchange party, this novelty item brings a smile to everybody's face! Unlike other gag gifts, this smart device will also prove USEFUL.

💯 LIFETIME WARRANTY - If anything goes wrong with the product, we GUARANTEE its replacement. If you ever have an issue, SIMPLY CONTACT US and we’ll make it up to you. Or get in touch anyway, we won't bite. Our team is well known for a top customer service. Remember, we are here to help.
